sourceOrganization.name: NIAID MTN Network
sourceOrganization.abstract: The Microbicide Trials Network (MTN) is an NIAID-funded global research network focused on preventing the sexual transmission of HIV. The network conducts clinical trials to evaluate microbicides and other biomedical prevention strategies.
sourceOrganization.description: The Microbicide Trials Network (MTN) is an NIAID-funded worldwide collaborative clinical trials network focused on preventing the sexual transmission of HIV. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/microbicide-trials-network
